page.title: 02BRIDGE OF WEIR - GALA WEEK
page.content: During May,we have our annual{Gala {Week}which was introduced in 1981. The aim is to bring all ages together for a week's entertainment while raising money for charities and organisations. A{Gala Queen}is chosen to officiate at events throughout the coming year. A typical week would be {Monday:}Football,netball and races {Tuesday:}A night of music and drama {Wednesday:}A fun night of indoor games {Thursday:}A dance with cheese and wine {Friday:}A "play-in" for young children followed by cartoon cavalcade {Saturday: Festival Day,}with a parade of floats depicting a common theme and an afternoon fete ending with a disco. {Sunday: }An interdenominational thanksgiving service ends the Gala. Contributors are : Round Table,Brass Band,B.O.W. Players, British Legion,Community Council.
